an9.43:1.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, kāyasakkhī vutto bhagavatā”ti?
an9.43:2.1: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.43:2.2: Yathā yathā ca tadāyatanaṃ tathā tathā naṃ kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an9.43:2.3: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, kāyasakkhī vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena. (1)
an9.43:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ …
an9.43:3.4: Yathā yathā ca tadāyatanaṃ tathā tathā naṃ kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an9.43:3.5: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, kāyasakkhī vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena. (2–4.)
an9.43:4.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati.
an9.43:4.2: Yathā yathā ca tadāyatanaṃ tathā tathā naṃ kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an9.43:4.3: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, kāyasakkhī vutto bhagavatā pariyāyena …pe…. (5–8.)
an9.43:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharati, paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
an9.43:5.2: Yathā yathā ca tadāyatanaṃ tathā tathā naṃ kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an9.43:5.3: Ettāvatāpi kho, āvuso, kāyasakkhī vutto bhagavatā nippariyāyenā”ti. (9)
